name: Moon Ground
description:
Use your Powers! Get the Fuel!

Moon Ground is an out-of-this-world Platformer with a twist of Gravity Inversion! You play as a Astronaut who is stranded on a strange Moon. He has no fuel for his spaceship to return home! 

Use your newly-found powers (and more too...) fight against enemies and get the fuel for your spaceship. 

Already finished the game? Well first of all, congratulations! Second, there is more content which is in the works! If you want to know more about it before anyone else, then follow me on my Social Media:

  • Twitter - @monteboombox
  • Itch.io - MonteBoomBox
  • YouTube - Monte BoomBox
  • Facebook - manas.joshi.35

I created this game n 30 days for GitHub's Game Off Game Jam 2020. I hope you enjoyed the game. If you did then please leave a review on the game. And if you want to donate to more projects like this then feel free to donate by clicking the Donate button below. Thanks for checking the game out.
